Sound A Little Secretive? Yup

We love surprises. And we love good food and excellent wine and beautiful locations and the wonderful things that happen when a covert band of gulls come together and collaborate.

Who and Sort of What

Kim Bartmann and fellow collaborators are opening a new place.

Why

We want to create a community. Assemble a flock of like-minded individuals who love to gather, appreciate good food, fine wines and art. You’re part of bringing it to life, and in return, you get a 15% bonus on the purchased value, and privileges.
